title: Find Explosives
content:
a secret door.

How to unlock Find Explosives

Brithvar gives you this quest in Grymforge, just past Sergeant Thrinn (X: -626 Y: 350). Alternatively, you can get this Quest from Lunkbug, one of the Deep Gnome slaves working at the dig site.

Find Explosives Rewards

Find Explosives Notes & Tips

Alternatively, you can use black powder bag from the windmill and hands grenades Notes & tips go here

Quests in Baldur's Gate 3 Acquire the Gauntlets for Helsik ♦ Aid the Underduke ♦ Ask the Goblin Prie
